text: emi? Hajj mariyu umra koraku vacce variki niru trapatanni mariyu masjid al haram nu nirvahincatanni, miru allah nu mariyu antimadinanni visvasinci, allah marganlo poradedaniki samananga bhavistunnara? Allah daggara, varu (i rendu paksala varu) sarisamanulu karu. Mariyu allah durmargulaina prajalaku sanmargam cupadu
